title: Modules
description: Modules are reusable bundles of related snippets and configurations. They provide complete solutions for specific features.

concept.whatIsAModule: A module is a collection of related snippets, configurations, and files that work together to implement a specific feature. Unlike individual snippets, modules include everything needed for a complete solution.
whenToUseModules: When you need a complete feature implementation
When snippets have dependencies on each other
When you want consistent configuration across files

modulesVsSnippets.snippets: Individual code files that can be used independently
modulesVsSnippets.modules: Complete feature implementations with multiple files and configurations
modulesVsSnippets.templates: Full project scaffolding that may include modules and snippets

modules.name: Internationalization (i18n)
modules.description: Multi-language support with translation files and utilities
modules.purpose: Add internationalization to your application with pre-configured translation files and utilities for managing multiple languages.
features: Easy to extend with more languages

extensibility.addLanguage: Create a new JSON file following the same structure
extensibility.addKeys: Add new keys to all language files to maintain consistency
extensibility.organize: Use nested objects to organize translations by feature
